title: Bug 7785 - SaveAs Forgets the file type
description: Bug 7785 - SaveAs Forgets the file type. The icon has also changed from the parent java file icon to a generic file icon.
OB:
1) Open an existing java file.
2) Modify the file, for example by moving an existing class.
3) Click the SaveAs icon, located next to the Save icon.
4) In the dialog that appears, browse for a valid container location.
5) Type the filename without including the file extension, as it is not requested.
6) Click OK.

Observed Behavior: The file is successfully added to the specified location in the Navigator, but the file extension is not shown.
EB: Expected Behavior: When saving the file using SaveAs, the file extension should be automatically appended to the filename and shown in the Navigator.
